Package net.delugan.teachly.utils

Class AuthenticatedModelAndView

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView
net.delugan.teachly.utils.AuthenticatedModelAndView
public class AuthenticatedModelAndView extends org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView
Extension of ModelAndView that automatically adds the authenticated user to the model. Simplifies controller methods by handling the common task of adding the current user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AuthenticatedModelAndView(String name, User user)
    Creates a new AuthenticatedModelAndView with the given view name and user.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthenticatedModelAndView

      public AuthenticatedModelAndView(String name, User user)
      Creates a new AuthenticatedModelAndView with the given view name and user. Automatically adds the user to the model with the key "me".
      Parameters:
      name - The view name
      user - The authenticated user
